props.name: active
props.description: Used to identify the link as the currently active page.

props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: color
props.description: Overrides the accent color inherited from the ThemeProvider.

props.name: radius
props.description: Overrides the radius inherited from the ThemeProvider.
